column1: Uchi////So why four stars? We enjoyed the vibe at Uchiko a lot better. Uchi is a smaller space and with the amount of people there it felt slightly claustrophobic. The service was polite and friendly. However
column2: the clientele at Uchi Houston just felt very snobbish. In particular the lady sitting next to my fiancee and I took it upon herself to mock me for praying before dinner (but my fiancee caught her doing so). I guess it's unfair to judge a place by the patrons but it is part of the experience. It won't stop us from going back to Uchi though.
